items.text: 'Moving on from Bliss', Short Stories , Am Oved, 2016.

'Beth, the Filipina', '*' & 'She is mad at me', three poems, A Naked Queen: An Anthology of Israeli Social Protest Poetry, ed. Dorit Weisman (Tel Aviv: Hakkibutz Hameohad, 2013, Hebrew), pp. 232, 241 & 187.
'And They had the Kinneret', short story, Masmerim 13(January, 2010), pp. 19-38.
'Morning, Michael', short story, in Bintaim 3 (March, 2009), pp. 41-44.
